class.name: sr_mechanism_model/J0Transmission
class.description: This transmission is used to control the theoretical joint 0s in our hand: the joint 0 is the combination of the joint 1 (distal) and joint 2 (middle). Those 2 joints are controlled by one actuator only but have a sensor each.

class.name: sr_mechanism_model/SimpleTransmission
class.description: This transmission is used to control the other joints of the Robot.
